mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, name, phone, point) values(#{id},#{password},#{name},#{phone},#{point})
mapper.select: select * from member where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into stockLike(id, srtnCd,itmsNm,diffAmount, dayRange, parValue, marketCap, numberOfListedShares, foreignOwnRate, turnover, per) values(#{id},#{srtnCd},#{itmsNm},#{diffAmount}, #{dayRange}, #{parValue}, #{marketCap}, #{numberOfListedShares}, #{foreignOwnRate}, #{turnover}, #{per})
mapper.select: select * from board where id = #{id} order by regdate desc
select * from board_reply where id = #{id} order by regdate desc
